channel.title: CVE Feed for The Foreman Project -- foreman
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Foreman Project -- foreman

item.title: CVE-2018-16861|2024-08-05T10:32:54.072Z -- the%20foreman%20project -- foreman
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) flaw was found in the foreman component of satellite. An attacker with privilege to create entries using the Hosts, Monitor, Infrastructure, or Administer Menus is able to execute a XSS attacks against other users, possibly leading to malicious code execution and extraction of the anti-CSRF token of higher privileged users. Foreman before 1.18.3, 1.19.1, and 1.20.0 are vulnerable.
